name: Color Cage
description:
Move and jump to stay within the Color Cage!

Don't fall into the center, and make sure not to jump off the last ring either!

Move Clockwise - D, Right Arrow, Right on joystick

Move CounterClockwise - A, Left Arrow, Left on joystick

Jump - Space, Left Alt, Left Control, Left Shift, Left Click, Right Click, or any Face Buttons on Gamepad
